item.description:
Meet at the smaller parking lot beyond the playing fields (nearer to the pavillion area). Look for my car at 11 am on 2/16!

Buckland Rd to Sand Hill Road to Nevers Road and the park. Go past the police station on Sand Hill Rd, parking lot will be to the left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the short blond haired gal in the red Toyota Camry. See you there!
item.why: This is an easy 1 mile plus walk through woods, open fields, etc.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: A walk in Nevers Park, South Windsor
